liweishi

The best project ever..

Assemble

Assemble is a component and static site generator that makes it dead simple to build modular sites, documentation and components from reusable templates and data.

  • Documentation
  • Plugins - Plugins extend the core functionality of Assemble.
  • Helpers - Documentation for the helpers in the handlebars-helpers library.

Contributing

All contributions are welcome! The simplest way to show your support for this project is to "star" it. Please see Contributing to Assemble for more information.
